question: Four years back I met a citizen girl of UAE regarding my interview, since a year she is coming in my dream & proposing me for marriage, i am already married, please guide me.
answer:
QUESTION
Four years back I met a UAE citizen girl regarding my interview, about 2 years back i again called her for a job for my friend, when i said just hello she recognized my voice, but since around a year she is coming in my dreams very oftenly asking me to marry her and I see myself happy with her, I am very satisfy with my current wife, that girl follows islam strictly. Me and my wife too follows islam strictly, I read quraan before sleep to avoid such dreams but even then she is coming in my dreams, please help me what to do.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is a Shaytani one.

You should ignore the dream and do not entertain any thoughts of the dream. Continue with your happy marriage life.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
